WordPress uses cookies for authentication. That means that in order to log in to your WordPress site, you must have cookies enabled in your browser.

== Enable Cookies in Your Browser ==

; Google Chrome: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647
; Mozilla Firefox: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/enable-and-disable-cookies-website-preferences
; Internet Explorer: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17442/windows-internet-explorer-delete-manage-cookies
; Safari: https://support.apple.com/kb/PH21411
; Opera: http://www.opera.com/help/tutorials/security/cookies/

== Unexpected Output / Headers Already Sent? ==

If you are seeing these errors, please see the [[FAQ_Troubleshooting#How_do_I_solve_the_Headers_already_sent_warning_problem.3F|Troubleshooting FAQ]].
